sentence.Network_en: Hideousness of aspect, deformity of instinct, troubled him not , and did not arouse his indignation.
sentence.Network_cn: 外形的丑陋和本性的怪异都不能惊动他, 触犯他.

auth_sentence.content: Far from being faceless, he was all face: the haters never tired of describing and drawing his hideousness.
